c:attribute.name: mac
c:attribute.description: Primary MAC address of the hub (corresponds to ethernet MAC)

c:attribute.name: hardwarever
c:attribute.description: Version of the hardware

c:attribute.name: osver
c:attribute.description: Version of the base hub OS software

c:attribute.name: agentver
c:attribute.description: Version of the agent code running on the hub

c:attribute.name: serialNum
c:attribute.description: Serial number of the hub

c:attribute.name: mfgInfo
c:attribute.description: Manufacturing information

c:attribute.name: bootloaderVer
c:attribute.description: Version of the bootloader running on the hub

c:attribute.name: firmwareGroup
c:attribute.description: Firmware group the hub belongs to

c:attribute.name: lastReset
c:attribute.description: A time UUID indicating the last time the hub was started in a factory fresh state.

c:attribute.name: lastDeviceAddRemove
c:attribute.description: A time UUID indicating the last time a device was either added or removed from the hub.

c:attribute.name: lastRestartReason
c:attribute.description: The reason for the last hub restart.

c:attribute.name: lastRestartTime
c:attribute.description: The time of the last hub restart.

c:attribute.name: lastFailedWatchdogChecksTime
c:attribute.description: The last time some watchdog checks failed

c:attribute.name: lastFailedWatchdogChecks
c:attribute.description: The set of failed watchdog checks, this is provided on a best effort basis and may not accurately reflect what actually caused a watchdog reset (we might fail to persist this information if an I/O failure caused the watchdog reset).

c:attribute.name: lastDbCheck
c:attribute.description: The last time an integrity check was run on the hub db.

c:attribute.name: lastDbCheckResults
c:attribute.description: A string describing the results of the last db check.

c:attribute.name: migrationDualEui64
c:attribute.description: True if the hub has ever had the dual EUI-64 problem after migration.

c:attribute.name: migrationDualEui64Fixed
c:attribute.description: True if the hub has had the fix for the dual EUI-64 issue applied.

c:attribute.name: mfgBatchNumber
c:attribute.description: Manufacturing raw batch number

c:attribute.name: mfgDate
c:attribute.description: Date of manufacture

c:attribute.name: mfgFactoryID
c:attribute.description: Manufacturing factory ID

c:attribute.name: hwFlashSize
c:attribute.description: Size of flash, in bytes

c:method.name: FirmwareUpdate
c:method.description: Requests that the hub update its firmware

c:parameter.name: priority
c:parameter.description: The urgency of the upgrade. NORMAL is whenever next cycles permit. URGENT means now. BELOW_MINIMUM is indicates that the current firmware is below platform min and to upgrade immediately.

c:parameter.name: type
c:parameter.description: The type of firmware being updated.

c:parameter.name: showLed
c:parameter.description: Whether to show the LED for firmware update or not.

c:return.name: status
c:return.description: A status indicating status of the firmware update

c:return.name: message
c:return.description: An informative message about the status

c:method.name: FactoryReset
c:method.description: Request to tell the hub to factory reset. This should remove all personal data from the hub

c:method.name: GetKnownDevices
c:method.description: Get a list of known device protocol addresses.

c:parameter.name: protocols
c:parameter.description: The set of protocols that should be returned

c:return.name: devices
c:return.description: The list of protocol addresses known to the hub.

c:method.name: GetDeviceInfo
c:method.description: Get a list of known device protocol addresses.

c:parameter.name: protocolAddress
c:parameter.description: The protocol address of the device to get the device information from.

c:event.name: FirmwareUpgradeProcess
c:event.description: Sent when a hub comes online. This may be very specific to the given protocol and require client interpretation.

c:parameter.name: percentDone
c:parameter.description: The percentage of the firmware that has been downloaded

c:parameter.name: status
c:parameter.description: An informative message about the status of the download

c:event.name: Deregister
c:event.description: Event sent from the platform to the hub informing it that it needs to deregister (boot all devices and factory reset)

c:event.name: StartUploadingCameraPreviews
c:event.description: Event sent from the platform to the hub informing it that it should start uploading camera preview snapshots up to the server. If the hub is already publishing snapshots, it should increment some counter for the number of requests it has received but not start new uploads so when StopCameraPreviews is issued it will know when it is safe to stop uploading.

c:parameter.name: uploadUrl
c:parameter.description: The URL at which the hub should upload multi-part batches of camera preview images.

c:event.name: StopUploadingCameraPreviews
c:event.description: Event sent from the platform to the hub informing it to stop uploading camera previews. This should decrement the counter of the PublishCameraPreviews (to account for multiple user sessions) and when it is zero should stop uploading.

c:event.name: UnpairedDeviceRemoved
c:event.description: Event sent when an unpaired or unvetted device is removed from the hub.

c:event.name: Attention
c:event.description: An event indicating that a hub needs attention

c:parameter.name: msg
c:parameter.description: A message associated with the attention alert
